Subjects: Christ, uniqueness of; sermons, verse in
_description: Christ’s singularity in a Latin sermon in natali domini — ten lines, alternating Latin and English

CULIi38.First Lines:
Queramus ergo istum puerumþat rotyth nowthistum
                        amicum…
CULIi38.Last Lines:
…illus idem perducat nos ad celumþat dere hath vs
                    bowth
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 16.
